short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to check the weather for today as well as the next three days in Singapore

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple and easy to use extension that tells you the current weather and the weather for the next three days. Additionally, this extension also shows you the cloudiness, humidity, and windspeed today and for the next three days. The layout of the extension is very simple and allows you to access the information very easily instead of scrolling through on a website to find information. The design is also very pleasing to the eye as the I focused a lot on creating the design and making it appealing. Because this is an extension, it is very accessible allowing you to save some time in your life. For any outdoor activity, you can simply click on the extension and find out whether the weather today or for any of the next three days is suitable.
